mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.title, c.lesson_num, c.cover, c.subject_id, c.subject_parent_id, c.teacher_id, t.name as teacherName, t.avatar as teacherAvatar, t.career as career, d.description FROM b_course c LEFT JOIN b_course_description d ON c.id = d.course_id and d.is_deleted = 0 left join b_teacher t on t.id = c.teacher_id and t.is_deleted = 0 WHERE c.id = #{id}

SELECT c.id, c.title, c.lesson_num, c.cover, s.title as subjectName, s2.title as subjectParentName, t.name as teacherName, d.description FROM b_course c LEFT JOIN b_course_description d ON c.id = d.course_id and d.is_deleted = 0 left join b_subject s on c.subject_id = s.id and s.is_deleted = 0 left join b_subject s2 on c.subject_parent_id = s2.id and s2.is_deleted = 0 left join b_teacher t on t.id = c.teacher_id and t.is_deleted = 0 WHERE c.id = #{id}
select * from b_course where is_deleted = 0 order by view_count limit 8
